overview: TearDrops is the story of Caleb Coats and his quest to from an entertainment sorority known as Diamond Dolls Elite (DDE). He took a dynamic group of aspiring and talented ladies to form an empire in the world of hip-hop dance, singing, rapping, modeling and acting. But the toughest challenge is not the outside completion, it's the inside where some have developed hidden motives to destroy the organization; and take over the Sorority. Envy and jealousy is a terrible combination and once egos clash within the sorority, all chaos and dissension set in as DDE faces its toughest challenge: Internal strife and turmoil. To survive the mutiny, Caleb must first decide who to trust. See and feel the struggles, disappointments, challenges, the victories - the blood, sweat, and tears as Caleb and DDE battle for superiority among the elite to establish the respect necessary to be called "The Best".
tagline: It's A Thin Line Between What You Deserve And What You Desire
title: Tear Drops - The Movie
